about_the_game:
MICROVERSE is a sci-fi adventure game set in the year 2094. It follows the journey of Fin Clawmill as he uncovers the past of the Na'ar star system. In MICROVERSE, the player has access to 2 different game modes; Freeplay and Campaign.

FREEPLAY:

In the freeplay mode of MICROVERSE, the player has complete freedom of what they want to do, instead of following a set story. All the boss fights and mini battles are accessible at all times, and you are able to use the merchant center whenever you want. This mode is recommended for players who aren't interested in large stories, and just want to explore freely.

CAMPAIGN:

In the campaign mode of MICROVERSE, the player follows a set story that takes place over 3 chapters. This gamemode includes 30+ cutscenes which make the story more in-depth. This mode is recommended for players who are interested in large plots and stories, and are less enthusiastic about exploration.

In both gamemodes, the player is able to use "skillpoints" to unlock new abilities, and can explore the 5 worlds in the system; Iedar, Lakaña, Tempal, Iova and Frezal.
